user.title: Connect to Lyngdorf Processor
user.description: Set up your Lyngdorf surround sound processor. You can connect via network (recommended) or RS-232 serial. [â˜• Tip the Author](https://buymeacoffee.com/DYks67r)

data_description.model_id: Select the model of your Lyngdorf processor.
data_description.url: For network: socket://192.168.1.100:84 or socket://lyngdorf.local:84. For RS-232: /dev/ttyUSB0 or COM3.
data_description.baudrate: Only needed for RS-232 serial connections. Most devices use 115200.

error.cannot_connect: Could not connect to the processor. Please check the address and ensure the device is powered on.
error.unsupported: This processor model is not supported.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for details.

sources.title: Input Source Names

zone2.title: Zone 2 Settings
zone2.description: Configure a secondary audio zone. Zone 2 outputs audio to a separate room or speaker set.

data_description.zone2_enabled: Create a separate media player entity for Zone 2.
data_description.zone2_default_source: The input source to select when Zone 2 is turned on.
data_description.zone2_max_volume: Safety limit for Zone 2 volume in decibels (dB). Recommended: -20 dB for safety.
